org.jgraphl.export

Class ExportFormat<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgraphl.export.ExportFormat<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V -
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Dot, GraphML

    public abstract class ExportFormat<V>
extends Object
    An XmlExportFormat describes how to export a Graph to a file in a specific XML based format.

    Convert resulting file to svg with

    dot -Tsvg file.dot > file.svg

    Author:
    ThorstenSeitz
